org.eclipse.emf.compare.util
Class ETools

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.emf.compare.util.ETools

public class ETools
extends java.lang.Object

This contains general support for ecore browsing.

ETools

Method Detail

getURI

public static java.lang.String getURI(EObject object)
Returns a URI for the eObject, i.e., either the eProxyURI, the URI of the eResource with the fragment produced by the eResource, or the URI consisting of just the fragment that would be produced by a default Resource with the eObject as its only contents.

Parameters:
eObject - the object for which to get the URI.
Returns:
the URI for the object.

validate

public static EObject validate(EObject root,
                               boolean blocker,
                               java.lang.String message)
It validates the given EMF object.

An error is put in the log if the validation failed.

  • !blocker || Diagnostic.OK => root
  • blocker && !Diagnostic.OK => null
  • root == null => null

    • Parameters:
    root - is the object to validate
    blocker - indicates if the result must be Diagnostic.OK
    message - is the error message to put in the log
    Returns:
    the given object or null

    computeAllClassifiers

    public static EClassifier[] computeAllClassifiers(EPackage ePackage)
    Search all the classifiers recursively in a package.

    Parameters:
    ePackage - is the container
    Returns:
    table of classifiers

    computeAllClassifiersList

    Returns:

    computeAllClassifiersList

    public static java.util.List computeAllClassifiersList(EPackage ePackage,
                                                       boolean classOnly)
    Search all the classifiers recursively in a package.

    Parameters:
    ePackage - is the container
    classOnly - indicates that only the classes are kept
    Returns:
    list of classifiers

    getEClassifier

    public static EClassifier getEClassifier(EPackage ePackage,
                                         java.lang.String name)
    Search a classifier recursively in a package.

    Remarks :

  • It never returns classifier java.resources.Folder if name = "File"
  • It never returns classifier java.resources.Folder if name = "older"
  • It returns classifier java.resources.Folder for "Folder" or "resources.Folder"

    • Parameters:
    ePackage - is the container
    name - is the classifier identifier
    Returns:
    classifier or null if not found

    getEStructuralFeature

    public static EStructuralFeature getEStructuralFeature(EClassifier currentEClassifier,
                                                       java.lang.String name)
    Returns the feature with this classifier and this name.

    Parameters:
    currentEClassifier - is the classifier
    name - is the feature name
    Returns:
    the feature

    getEClassifierFactoryName

    public static java.lang.String getEClassifierFactoryName(EClassifier eClassifier)
    Returns a factory name for a classifier. There is a factory by package. The factory is used to create instances of classifiers.

    Sample : "ResourcesFactory" is the name of the factory java.resources.ResourcesFactory

    Parameters:
    eClassifier - is the classifier
    Returns:
    the factory name

    getEClassifierFactoryShortName

    public static java.lang.String getEClassifierFactoryShortName(EClassifier eClassifier)
    Returns a factory short name for a classifier. There is a factory by package. The factory is used to create instances of classifiers.

    Sample : "Resources" is the short name of the factory java.resources.ResourcesFactory

    Parameters:
    eClassifier - is the classifier
    Returns:
    the factory short name

    getEClassifierPath

    public static java.lang.String getEClassifierPath(EClassifier eClassifier)
    Returns the full path of the classifier.

    Sample : "java.resources.JavaFile" is the full path for the classifier java.resources.JavaFile

    Parameters:
    eClassifier - is the classifier
    Returns:
    full path of the classifier

    getEClassifierShortPath

    public static java.lang.String getEClassifierShortPath(EClassifier eClassifier)
    Returns the short path of the classifier.

    Sample : "resources.JavaFile" is the short path for the classifier java.resources.JavaFile

    Parameters:
    eClassifier - is the classifier
    Returns:
    short path of the classifier

    createPackageHierarchy

    public static EPackage createPackageHierarchy(java.lang.String path)
    Creates a package and his children in an ecore model. The children are separated by '.'

    Sample : "a.b.c" is a package full path,

    "a", "b", and "c" packages are created, the root package "a" is returned.

    Parameters:
    path - is the package full path
    Returns:
    the root package

    getEPackage

    public static EPackage getEPackage(EPackage parent,
                                   java.lang.String path)
    Get a package in a parent package.

    Sample : "a.b" is a parent package and "c.d" is a relative path,

    "a.b.c.d" package is returned.

    Parameters:
    parent - is the parent package
    path - is the relative path of the required package
    Returns:
    the required package, null if not found

    ofType

    public static boolean ofType(EClassifier classifier,
                             java.lang.String type)
    Indicates if an instance of the classifier is an instance of the type.

    Parameters:
    classifier - is the classifier
    type - is the type
    Returns:
    true if an instance of the classifier is an instance of the type

    ofClass

    public static boolean ofClass(EClassifier classifier,
                              java.lang.String type)
    Indicates if the type corresponds to the name of the classifier.

    Parameters:
    classifier - is the classifier
    type - is the type
    Returns:
    true if the type corresponds to the name of the classifier
